channel.title: Project P2P
channel.description:
Welcome to Project P2P Advertisement:
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/546/o4qd.jpg/][IMG]http://img546.imageshack.us/img546/475/o4qd.jpg[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
gambling added to edgeville like original PP2P!:
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/547/ivm9.png/][IMG]http://imageshack.us/scaled/large/547/ivm9.png[/img][/URL]
KBD LAIR ADDED with new objects: [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/29/d3pm.png/][IMG]http://imageshack.us/scaled/large/29/d3pm.png[/img][/URL]
Blue dragons near castle:
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/707/bzec.png/][IMG]http://imageshack.us/scaled/thumb/707/bzec.png[/img][/URL]
Master Fisher :
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/22/o0la.png/][IMG]http://imageshack.us/scaled/thumb/22/o0la.png[/img][/URL]
Client Resize:
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/43/jrmj.png/][IMG]http://imageshack.us/scaled/thumb/43/jrmj.png[/img] [/URL]
Shop:
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/109/j0oe.png/][IMG]http://imageshack.us/scaled/large/109/j0oe.png[/img][/URL] Project P2P!
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/69/ock4.png/][IMG]http://imageshack.us/scaled/large/69/ock4.png[/img][/URL]
EXP RATES: [color=yellow]30x non sub 35x sub[/color]
- Drop Rates done.
Charlie coming soon.
-Rock of Ages Added and roams wilderness. Join Us At http://www.rscdomination.net
See you on Project P2P!!
Team Project P2P!

item.title: Project P2P
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

I have locked this for the time being, due to the amount of spam and arguing on this thread. I will direct this problem to another staff member, one who knows more about this whole thing. I suggest that you refrain from creating another advertisement, projektp2p, as I’m only locking this temporarily until the staff members come to a consensus.

Read full topic

item.title: Project P2P
item.dc:creator: @ZeIdar ZeIdar
item.description:
@ZeIdar wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:30, topic:525179"][quote author=JUMPHIM link=topic=643871.msg4333911#msg4333911 date=1374045005]

[quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=643045.msg4330004#msg4330004 date=1373506693]

Yea. We need to learn if we don’t know how to do so, at least he is trying. Don’t be too mean,dude. Give him a chance, and let’s us see his ser
[/quote]He can’t even do the most basic things imaginable, how can you expect him to fix a bug, add new content, or even secure his player’s passwords?

This is what you posted on classic fun. you say you comment about it but that looks more like a attacking him to me.

All I’m saying is let them try let them fail, if you want to help them help them. Don’t make them feel like shit there just learning.
[/quote][/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Project P2P
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“JUMPHIM, post:27, topic:525179”]If this really was Matt’s server I would play but it isn’t.
cff It seems to me you attack every server that comes out these days. If your not here to support rsc just leave.
gl gil I recommend you change your name soon peace.[/quote]I don’t attack any servers… If there is a topic or server breaking the rules, I comment about it. If there is something players should know about a server, I comment about it. If I have a question, I ask it. If there is nothing like that, then I simply don’t post.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @JUMPHIM JUMPHIM
item.description:
@JUMPHIM wrote:

If this really was Matt’s server I would play but it isn’t.
cff It seems to me you attack every server that comes out these days. If your not here to support rsc just leave.
gl gil I recommend you change your name soon peace.

Read full topic

item.title: Project P2P
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“Chrix, post:25, topic:525179”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=643871.msg4333813#msg4333813 date=1374034383]

[quote author=Chrix link=topic=643871.msg4333779#msg4333779 date=1374027626]I understand what you’re saying but you must realize it stands for Permanent Player 2 Player rather than Project Player 2 Player.[/quote]Lol, no. Both are Project P2P. The word permanent isn’t the first one for either.

[quote author=Chrix link=topic=643871.msg4333779#msg4333779 date=1374027626]This is not the original source for PP2P nor is it in any means complete. It is currently in the beta stage and we have a lot of work to improve on the server not including becoming exactly like PP2P nor any other server.[/quote]Same goes for other Stork servers… You’re trying to get the mods to behave inconsistently, just because you like this server.

[quote author=Chrix link=topic=643871.msg4333779#msg4333779 date=1374027626]If you are the side of deleting this post then I have every right to assume you are more in terms of keeping RSCE the only server on mopar as you bash every post outside of RSCE itself… I remember in the past you were against Matts logic of selling rares for IRL cash, and now you basically are supporting Pyru who is acting the same ideal.[/quote]That’s not true. I’ve taken many issues with RSCE and other servers that are breaking the rules or have something that users should be aware of.

Also, it’s quite obvious that I’m 100% against what Pyru is doing, and I’ve taken it up with several mods, and have messaged admins, who haven’t responded.

[quote author=Chrix link=topic=643871.msg4333779#msg4333779 date=1374027626]Makes me sick Ed… really.[/quote]What makes me sick is that you’re blatantly misrepresenting what I stand for, in an attempt to vilify me. All I’m trying to do is keep the moderators acting in a consistent manner, whereas you want this server to have special treatment, just because you like it.

Ed my point is that if RSCE can get past the rules then what is the issue with a different server attempting to gain a player base? I guess you can say I am asking how can it hurt, seeing as the RSCE player base will not disperse or be disregarded anytime soon it seems unjust to assume the fact that this server is breaking the rules. If anything it is none of your business even though you like to come up with an answer for everything constantly acting as a citizens on patrol would (I.E. eldery people on community watch in america).

I will ask you once and only once to leave this thread as all you are doing is bringing negativity into it, thanks buddy hope you have a good one <3.
[/quote]You act as if I think it’s right that RSCE gets to break the rules… I don’t think it’s right, but that doesn’t mean every other server should be allowed to break them as well.

Furthermore, I’m not assuming that it’s breaking the rules… It is banned from being advertised here; therefore advertising it here is breaking the rules.

As for bringing negativity into it, of course I’m not going to stop. This thread shouldn’t exist in the first place, and should be deleted like the other two posted this week.

One again i understand your concern Edward but you are missing out on the biggest point which is if you are going to slander this server and its representation then why not slander RSCE? You talk big but I see no walking, therefore my assumptions are completely valid.

If you have any other concerns feel free to pm me as this is ridiculous ruining a thread with us gallivanting around acting as if we have any control what so ever over the server. If this post gets deleted we demand RSCE gets taken down as well… and what does that mean? No RSC server advertisement on this forum due to rules that are completely obscene.

Thank you, come again.[/quote]How am I slandering the server when this thread is in direct violation of a decision an admin made? I didn’t say the owner is doing anything wrong, other than posting this thread. I didn’t say the server is shit. You’re simply trying to vilify me because you like this server, it’s blatantly obvious and just makes you look like an idiot.

Furthermore, I have spoken out against RSCE on numerous occasions, and I’ve been threatened by a staff member every single time I speak out about it, in the thread. In addition, my posts are continually deleted, even though I was merely providing constructive critisim.

As for demanding RSCE be taken down, that is entirely unrelated to this issue. The issue at hand is that this is an advertisement for a server that is banned from being advertised. An admin has not banned RSCE yet, and therefore is in an entirely different stage in the process.

Read full topic

item.title: Project P2P
item.dc:creator: @Chrix Chrix
item.description:
@Chrix wrote:

[quote=“CodeForFame, post:23, topic:525179”][quote author=Chrix link=topic=643871.msg4333812#msg4333812 date=1374034132]

[quote author=Chrix link=topic=643871.msg4333779#msg4333779 date=1374027626]If you are the side of deleting this post then I have every right to assume you are more in terms of keeping RSCE the only server on mopar as you bash every post outside of RSCE itself… I remember in the past you were against Matts logic of selling rares for IRL cash, and now you basically are supporting Pyru who is acting the same ideal.[/quote]That’s not true. I’ve taken many issues with RSCE and other servers that are breaking the rules or have something that users should be aware of.

Also, it’s quite obvious that I’m 100% against what Pyru is doing, and I’ve taken it up with several mods, and have messaged admins, who haven’t responded.

[quote author=Chrix link=topic=643871.msg4333779#msg4333779 date=1374027626]Makes me sick Ed… really.[/quote]What makes me sick is that you’re blatantly misrepresenting what I stand for, in an attempt to vilify me. All I’m trying to do is keep the moderators acting in a consistent manner, whereas you want this server to have special treatment, just because you like it.

Ed my point is that if RSCE can get past the rules then what is the issue with a different server attempting to gain a player base? I guess you can say I am asking how can it hurt, seeing as the RSCE player base will not disperse or be disregarded anytime soon it seems unjust to assume the fact that this server is breaking the rules. If anything it is none of your business even though you like to come up with an answer for everything constantly acting as a citizens on patrol would (I.E. eldery people on community watch in america).

I will ask you once and only once to leave this thread as all you are doing is bringing negativity into it, thanks buddy hope you have a good one <3.
[/quote]You act as if I think it’s right that RSCE gets to break the rules… I don’t think it’s right, but that doesn’t mean every other server should be allowed to break them as well.

Furthermore, I’m not assuming that it’s breaking the rules… It is banned from being advertised here; therefore advertising it here is breaking the rules.

As for bringing negativity into it, of course I’m not going to stop. This thread shouldn’t exist in the first place, and should be deleted like the other two posted this week.[/quote]

One again i understand your concern Edward but you are missing out on the biggest point which is if you are going to slander this server and its representation then why not slander RSCE? You talk big but I see no walking, therefore my assumptions are completely valid.

If you have any other concerns feel free to pm me as this is ridiculous ruining a thread with us gallivanting around acting as if we have any control what so ever over the server. If this post gets deleted we demand RSCE gets taken down as well… and what does that mean? No RSC server advertisement on this forum due to rules that are completely obscene.

Thank you, come again.

Read full topic

item.title: Project P2P
item.dc:creator: @tungi01 tungi01
item.description:
@tungi01 wrote:

Gil your never going to get a fair shot with these guys change your post advertisement to rscdomination. and just clarify that its not projeect p2p but simply making a server as fun as project p2p. its crazy the kid is trying to make a server and gets no support. he has giving out subs at no cost and hasn’t made a single dollar off this game.

It is currently in the beta stage and we have a lot of work to improve on the server not including becoming exactly like PP2P nor any other server.[/quote]Same goes for other Stork servers… You’re trying to get the mods to behave inconsistently, just because you like this server.

I’ve taken many issues with RSCE and other servers that are breaking the rules or have something that users should be aware of.

Also, it’s quite obvious that I’m 100% against what Pyru is doing, and I’ve taken it up with several mods, and have messaged admins, who haven’t responded.

item.title: Project P2P
item.dc:creator: @Chrix Chrix
item.description:
@Chrix wrote:

I understand what you’re saying but you must realize it stands for Permanent Player 2 Player rather than Project Player 2 Player. This is not the original source for PP2P nor is it in any means complete. It is currently in the beta stage and we have a lot of work to improve on the server not including becoming exactly like PP2P nor any other server.

If you are the side of deleting this post then I have every right to assume you are more in terms of keeping RSCE the only server on mopar as you bash every post outside of RSCE itself… I remember in the past you were against Matts logic of selling rares for IRL cash, and now you basically are supporting Pyru who is acting the same ideal.

Makes me sick Ed… really.

Read full topic

item.title: Project P2P
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“Chrix, post:16, topic:525179”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=643871.msg4333721#msg4333721 date=1374019828]

[quote author=Chrix link=topic=643871.msg4333681#msg4333681 date=1374014568]

I keep reporting this thread because this server is banned from advertising on here…

This is the second or third time I’ve come across complaints about this guy’s server.

Project P2p may no longer be advertised on this website. Consider it banned and completely unwelcome.

Matt’s (google) latest posts were made from the IP 70.81.39.242 - his email address, currently set to private in his profile, is debilitation@gmail.com.
Do what you will, because I won’t tolerate people that take part in deceitful activity like this, abusing the charitable nature of others.[/quote]

Complaint Thread:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,392306.0.html

Original Thread:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,403369.0.html

Edward, first and foremost that was a post regarding MATT’s server PP2P over 4 years ago. Clearly this is a offshoot of it ran by somebody other than MATT and this server is incomplete in beta mode. So please explain how this server is the same as MATT’s server? Thanks.

EDIT: They deleted Matts PP2P post due to him selling items for irl cash, isn’t Pyru doing the same? Gtfo.
[/quote]Project P2P is banned, just like Stork PK… Stork was banned for DDoSing and such, but it always gets removed, even with different owners. And Stork was banned before Project P2P, so time since it was banned means nothing.

As for the reasoning, that PP2P was banned and RSCE isn’t, you’re going to have to take that up with the admins. I’ve pointed out that donations breaks rule 8, which includes: “This includes offering ‘rewards’ for donations or anything like that.” But, I’ve always been ignored.

Furthermore, I’d like to see some actual evidence that it isn’t run by Matt… He’s come back to the community several times, which is one of the reasons why I’m not believing that it isn’t Matt or someone else who is banned from advertising here.

I understand your logic edward but I fail to comprehend the logic of the board rules when it comes down to different owners taking a previous servers name. It’s been five years since pp2p was gone and me and you have been through a lot, so I request you leave this up to a moderator or admin to decide the fate so I can fight it.

Some things on this board are obviously blown out of proportion and all I request is equality between servers, If RSCE is up and breaking the rules every day… why turn down a new server with a great owner with a goal and great intentions? It seems to be very contradicting nowadays.[/quote]It has been left up to the staff to decide, which is why it was deleted twice already… I don’t have the ability to lock or delete threads, only staff members do.

Also, it is perfectly logical to ban servers that are banned… The only reason new people open up a new server is to piggyback off the name or for the original owner to open it again under a new alias.

As for why they’re removing this, it’s because the server is banned from advertising. If he wanted to make a truly new server, nobody would have batted an eye, but he’s trying to piggyback off of Project P2P, to the point where he’s even stealing the name, which is banned.

Read full topic

item.title: Project P2P
item.dc:creator: @Chrix Chrix
item.description:
@Chrix wrote:

[quote=“CodeForFame, post:14, topic:525179”][quote author=Chrix link=topic=643871.msg4333681#msg4333681 date=1374014568]

Edward, first and foremost that was a post regarding MATT’s server PP2P over 4 years ago. Clearly this is a offshoot of it ran by somebody other than MATT and this server is incomplete in beta mode. So please explain how this server is the same as MATT’s server? Thanks.

EDIT: They deleted Matts PP2P post due to him selling items for irl cash, isn’t Pyru doing the same? Gtfo.
[/quote]Project P2P is banned, just like Stork PK… Stork was banned for DDoSing and such, but it always gets removed, even with different owners. And Stork was banned before Project P2P, so time since it was banned means nothing.

As for the reasoning, that PP2P was banned and RSCE isn’t, you’re going to have to take that up with the admins. I’ve pointed out that donations breaks rule 8, which includes: “This includes offering ‘rewards’ for donations or anything like that.” But, I’ve always been ignored.

Furthermore, I’d like to see some actual evidence that it isn’t run by Matt… He’s come back to the community several times, which is one of the reasons why I’m not believing that it isn’t Matt or someone else who is banned from advertising here.[/quote]

I understand your logic edward but I fail to comprehend the logic of the board rules when it comes down to different owners taking a previous servers name. It’s been five years since pp2p was gone and me and you have been through a lot, so I request you leave this up to a moderator or admin to decide the fate so I can fight it.

Some things on this board are obviously blown out of proportion and all I request is equality between servers, If RSCE is up and breaking the rules every day… why turn down a new server with a great owner with a goal and great intentions? It seems to be very contradicting nowadays.

Read full topic

thas not fair my name is Gil wat more can i do to prove im not matt…

item.title: Project P2P
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“Chrix, post:12, topic:525179”][quote author=CodeForFame link=topic=643871.msg4333652#msg4333652 date=1374012273]
I keep reporting this thread because this server is banned from advertising on here…

This is the second or third time I’ve come across complaints about this guy’s server.

Project P2p may no longer be advertised on this website. Consider it banned and completely unwelcome.

Matt’s (google) latest posts were made from the IP 70.81.39.242 - his email address, currently set to private in his profile, is debilitation@gmail.com.
Do what you will, because I won’t tolerate people that take part in deceitful activity like this, abusing the charitable nature of others.[/quote]

Complaint Thread:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,392306.0.html

Original Thread:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,403369.0.html

Edward, first and foremost that was a post regarding MATT’s server PP2P over 4 years ago. Clearly this is a offshoot of it ran by somebody other than MATT and this server is incomplete in beta mode. So please explain how this server is the same as MATT’s server? Thanks.

EDIT: They deleted Matts PP2P post due to him selling items for irl cash, isn’t Pyru doing the same? Gtfo.[/quote]Project P2P is banned, just like Stork PK… Stork was banned for DDoSing and such, but it always gets removed, even with different owners. And Stork was banned before Project P2P, so time since it was banned means nothing.

As for the reasoning, that PP2P was banned and RSCE isn’t, you’re going to have to take that up with the admins. I’ve pointed out that donations breaks rule 8, which includes: “This includes offering ‘rewards’ for donations or anything like that.” But, I’ve always been ignored.

Furthermore, I’d like to see some actual evidence that it isn’t run by Matt… He’s come back to the community several times, which is one of the reasons why I’m not believing that it isn’t Matt or someone else who is banned from advertising here.
